#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

vector <int> c[50001];

int color[50001];

bool bfs(int x)
{
    queue<int> Q;

    int s , v;

    Q.push(x);

    while(!Q.empty())
    {
        x = Q.front();
        Q.pop();

        s = c[x].size();

        if(color[x] == 0)
            color[x] = 1;

        for(int i = 0 ; i < s ; i++)
        {
            v = c[x][i];

           // cout << v << endl;

            if(color[x] == color[v])
                return false;

            else if(color[x] == 1 && color[v] == 0)
                color[v] = -1;

            else if(color[x] == -1 && color[v] == 0)
                color[v] = 1;

        }

       // cout << color[1]  << " " <<color[2] <<" " << color[3] << endl;
    }

    return true;

}

int main()
{
    int e, v;

    cin >> e >> v;

    int x , y;

    for(int i = 0 ; i < v ; i++)
    {
        cin >> x >> y;

        c[x].push_back(y);
        c[y].push_back(x);
    }

    int i = 1;

    for( i = 1 ; i <=v ; i++)
    {
        if(bfs(i))
            continue;

        else
            break;
    }

    //for(int i = 0 ; i < e ; i++)
        //cout << color[i] <<" ";

    if( i <= e)
        cout <<"YES" << endl;

    else
        cout << "NO" << endl;

    return 0;


}
